scripts.start: pnpm zellij-launcher --layout zellij.kdl a $npm_package_name|| zellij --layout zellij.kdl -s $npm_package_name
scripts.docs:dev: node openapi-transform.js && pwag docs/public/icon.svg docs/web-config.json -o docs/public && pnpm run publish-typedoc && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: node openapi-transform.js && pwag docs/public/icon.svg docs/web-config.json -o docs/public && pnpm run publish-typedoc && vitepress build docs
